# cloudSharingControllerDidStopSharing(_:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate that the user has stopped sharing the record.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func cloudSharingControllerDidStopSharing(_ csc: UICloudSharingController)
```

## Discussion

Implement this method to receive a notification from the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICloudSharingController] instance after the user who owns the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CloudKit/CKShare] record stops sharing it with all participants.

## Processing shared items

- **cloudSharingController(_:failedToSaveShareWithError:)**: Tells the delegate that the CloudKit sharing controller failed to save the share record.
- **cloudSharingControllerDidSaveShare(_:)**: Tells the delegate that the CloudKit sharing controller saved the share record.
